special_text:
During each of your turns, you may activate one of the loyalty abilities of Marilye an additional time for each player and permanent that was attacked this turn.
[+1]: Create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Draw a card.”)[/i]
[-6]: Search target player's library for a nonland card. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. That player shuffles.
